name: meme-battle-royale
description: Privacy-preserving meme battle DApp powered by Zama's FHEVM by 0xSyncroot

scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd blockchain && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install && cd ../worker && pnpm install
scripts.build:all: cd blockchain && pnpm run compile && cd ../frontend && pnpm run build && cd ../worker && pnpm run build
scripts.clean: cd blockchain && pnpm run clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf .next && cd ../worker && rm -rf node_modules

author: 0xSyncroot
